keyword: how many calories are in a honeycrisp apple
title: How Many Calories Are in a Honeycrisp Apple?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in a honeycrisp apple, including carbs, fiber, sugars, protein, fat, and quick tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories Are in a Honeycrisp Apple?
assumptions: Medium size (~182 g), raw with skin, core included but uneaten; typical Honeycrisp variety.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by apple size, ripeness, growing conditions, and storage; values are averages—check labels if available.

quick_answer.text: One medium Honeycrisp apple provides ~95 kcal and ~4.4 g fiber.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories are in a honeycrisp apple?
faqs.a: About 95 kcal for one medium Honeycrisp apple.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a honeycrisp apple?
faqs.a: Roughly 25 g total carbs, including 4.4 g fiber and 19 g sugars.

faqs.q: Is a honeycrisp apple low in fat or protein?
faqs.a: Yes—only 0.3 g fat and 0.5 g protein per medium apple.

faqs.q: How does apple size affect calories?
faqs.a: Smaller apples (~150 g) have ~78 kcal; larger (~223 g) around 120 kcal.

faqs.q: Are honeycrisp apples high in fiber?
faqs.a: Yes, about 4.4 g per medium apple, aiding digestion.
